member.name: T:Fins.Resources
member.summary: 一个强类型的资源类，用于查找本地化的字符串等。

member.name: P:Fins.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: 返回此类使用的缓存的 ResourceManager 实例。

member.name: P:Fins.Resources.Culture
member.summary: 使用此强类型资源类，为所有资源查找 重写当前线程的 CurrentUICulture 属性。

member.name: P:Fins.Resources.Acknowlege
member.summary: 查找类似 Specialized use in conjunction with programming commands. The server (or slave) has accepted the request and is processing it, but a long duration of time will be required to do so. This response is returned to prevent a timeout error from occurring in the client (or master). The client (or master) can next issue a Poll Program Complete message to determine if processing is completed. 的本地化字符串。

member.name: P:Fins.Resources.EmptyEndPoint
member.summary: 查找类似 Argument endPoint cannot be empty. 的本地化字符串。

member.name: P:Fins.Resources.GatewayPathUnavailable
member.summary: 查找类似 Specialized use in conjunction with gateways, indicates that the gateway was unable to allocate an internal communication path from the input port to the output port for processing the request. Usually means that the gateway is misconfigured or overloaded. 的本地化字符串。

member.name: P:Fins.Resources.GatewayTargetDeviceFailedToRespond
member.summary: 查找类似 Specialized use in conjunction with gateways, indicates that no response was obtained from the target device. Usually means that the device is not present on the network. 的本地化字符串。

member.name: P:Fins.Resources.HexCharacterCountNotEven
member.summary: 查找类似 Hex string must have even number of characters. 的本地化字符串。

member.name: P:Fins.Resources.IllegalDataAddress
member.summary: 查找类似 The data address received in the query is not an allowable address for the server (or slave). More specifically, the combination of reference number and transfer length is invalid. For a controller with 100 registers, the PDU addresses the first register as 0, and the last one as 99. If a request is submitted with a starting register address of 96 and a quantity of registers of 4, then this request will successfully operate (address-wise at least) on registers 96, 97, 98, 99. If a request is submitted with [字符串的其余部分被截断]"; 的本地化字符串。

member.name: P:Fins.Resources.IllegalDataValue
member.summary: 查找类似 A value contained in the query data field is not an allowable value for server (or slave). This indicates a fault in the structure of the remainder of a complex request, such as that the implied length is incorrect. It specifically does NOT mean that a data item submitted for storage in a register has a value outside the expectation of the application program, since the Fins protocol is unaware of the significance of any particular value of any particular register. 的本地化字符串。

member.name: P:Fins.Resources.IllegalFunction
member.summary: 查找类似 The function code received in the query is not an allowable action for the server (or slave). This may be because the function code is only applicable to newer devices, and was not implemented in the unit selected. It could also indicate that the server (or slave) is in the wrong state to process a request of this type, for example because it is unconfigured and is being asked to return register values. 的本地化字符串。

member.name: P:Fins.Resources.MemoryParityError
member.summary: 查找类似 Specialized use in conjunction with function codes 20 and 21 and reference type 6, to indicate that the extended file area failed to pass a consistency check. 的本地化字符串。

member.name: P:Fins.Resources.NetworkBytesNotEven
member.summary: 查找类似 Array networkBytes must contain an even number of bytes. 的本地化字符串。

member.name: P:Fins.Resources.SlaveDeviceBusy
member.summary: 查找类似 Specialized use in conjunction with programming commands. The server (or slave) is engaged in processing a long–duration program command. The client (or master) should retransmit the message later when the server (or slave) is free. 的本地化字符串。

member.name: P:Fins.Resources.SlaveDeviceFailure
member.summary: 查找类似 An unrecoverable error occurred while the server (or slave) was attempting to perform the requested action. 的本地化字符串。

member.name: P:Fins.Resources.SlaveExceptionResponseFormat
member.summary: 查找类似 Function Code: {1}{0}Exception Code: {2} - {3} 的本地化字符串。

member.name: P:Fins.Resources.SlaveExceptionResponseInvalidFunctionCode
member.summary: 查找类似 Invalid function code value for SlaveExceptionResponse. 的本地化字符串。

member.name: P:Fins.Resources.TimeoutNotSupported
member.summary: 查找类似 The compact framework UDP client does not support timeouts. 的本地化字符串。

member.name: P:Fins.Resources.UdpClientNotConnected
member.summary: 查找类似 UdpClient must be bound to a default remote host. Call the Connect method. 的本地化字符串。

member.name: P:Fins.Resources.Unknown
member.summary: 查找类似 Unknown slave exception code. 的本地化字符串。

member.name: P:Fins.Resources.WaitRetryGreaterThanZero
member.summary: 查找类似 WaitToRetryMilliseconds must be greater than 0. 的本地化字符串。
